description:
The data explores the main types and sources of energy consumption within districts in Kenya, according to the 2009 Census. 
The focus of the data is directed specifically at energy sources around lighting and it gives a good indication of the distribution of Energy access throughout the county, from Electricity to Kerosene lanterns and, Pressure lamps, solar and wood fuels

name: Main Lighting Energy Sources averaged to Districts in 2009
